name: 陳盈竹
objective:
以美學入門為基礎，觀察日常生活美學的可能，進而達到提升美學的培養。
課程將著重於各個產業別對於” 美 “的建構，探討各面向” 美 “的改造及創新等。以大眾美學為觀察目標進而達到在各專業裡推廣” 美 “的最終目的。
Base on introduction to aesthetics.  By daily observation of our surroundings and environment, students are asked to take a closer look to our living world.  Class will focus on case studies of aesthetic application and renovation on various design fields.  The goal of the class is to develop the daily behavior to living environment attention and eventually promoting aesthetic standards in every profession. 
Class will include individual presentation and group discussion.
